short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace imperial units with metric units.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds the metric unit after imperial units.
Converts Cups to Deciliters,
Feet to Meters,
Inches to Centimeters,
Gallons to Liters,
Pounds to Kilograms,
Miles to Kilometers.
